images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of spring in Turkey, showcasing blooming flowers and family-friendly activities.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight specific attractions and experiences in Turkey for spring travelers, featuring iconic landmarks and scenic views.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight specific attractions and experiences in Turkey for spring travelers, featuring iconic landmarks and scenic views.

AI-selected Promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and deals related to spring travel in Turkey.

AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and connect with the Turkish travel theme.
AI-selected The background pattern will create a warm and inviting atmosphere for the email, enhancing the overall spring theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of spring in Turkey
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and colorful, showcasing natural beauty and cultural landmarks
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting the beauty of spring in Turkey with blooming flowers, coastal views, and family-friendly activities

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight popular tourist spots in Turkey during spring
assetRequirements.visual_style: bright and cheerful, focusing on cultural sites and nature
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing iconic locations in Turkey such as beaches, historical sites, and vibrant markets

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Весенний рай в Турции. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of spring in Turkey, showcasing blooming flowers and family-friendly activities.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
